>From: jseiders@...

>alter prices at vendor, being 120... I've currently sought quite a few Chr
>items (Stien, Silk Eve. Tunic, Order of Thunder, Leatherfoot Cap, and still
>need two Oppalines) which would be enough to boost the an average Charisma
>(75!) to this number... but, it is true?ï¿½ I'm waiting to have a 'suit'
>available so that I may fletch in a few sessions (At 92 skill, need to bug

Not true. I have the same base cha, and got most of the same item.
when I aquired a Crude Stien, my Cha (with kit) went from 120 to 135.
Somewhere in that 15point jump is annother price step, as I get
slightly cheaper prices now from then. (its only noticable on the big
items. Go price out some plate armor). When I get a Plat Star ruby
veil (+9/+9 Cha/Dex) I don't know if I will see another price
lowering....

BTW my current kit is: 2 oppalinnes, 2 gold cats eye bracers, silk
shirt, thunder medal, leatherfoot cap, stien, brass ring. Ive got a
10slot backpack so they all fit in it. I vowed that I wouldn't go
over 10 items. This also includes all the easy to get items, the next
ones are ones like siren hair hood, and other items that I have never
seen at auc, or only for trade in the 1000+p range. And thats just to
steep for my lvl 25 self.
